alert.note: Alert for Kimble; Sutton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 9:40PM CDT until June 16 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Kimble County in west central Texas... East central Sutton County in west central Texas... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 940 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cleo, or 7 miles east of Roosevelt, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Kimble and east central Sutton Counties, including the following locations... I-10 Near The Sutton-Kimble County Line and Cleo. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 426 and 452. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
